title: Idea
lyrics:
[Instrumental Intro]
[Verse 1]
I been thinkin', sittin' on a pole
I'm gettin' sick of doin' what I'm told
Just me in the mirror and my brain
[Chorus]
But that was when I got an idea
Came like a gun and shot in my ear
Don't you think it's time
You got up and stood alone?
[Instrumental Break]
[Verse 2]
Fifteen years, I laid down on the ground
I couldn't feel any noise or hear any sound
Fifteen million years, I spent down the line
[Chorus]
But that was when I got an idea
Came like a gun and shot in my ear
Don't you think it's time
You got up and stood alone?

[Break]
Get up and stand alone
[Guitar Solo]
(Last night, I got an idea)
(I got an idea)
(Last night, I got an idea)
(I got an idea)
[Chorus]
That was when I got an idea
It came like a gun and shot in my ear
Don't you think it's time
You got up and stood alone?
[Break]
Get up and stand alone
[Outro]
(Last night, I got an idea, I got an idea)
(Last night, I got an idea, I got an idea)
(Last night, I got an idea, I got an idea)
(Last night, I got an idea, I got an idea)
(Last night, I got an idea)...
